OrgName.entry: PLACES FOR PEOPLE - WINDMILL LANE PROJECT

Desc.entry: Part of the registered charity Places for People, the Windmill Lane Project houses families referred to them by Sheffield City Council's Sheffield Homes. The project manages 19 two and three bedroom fully furnished houses where families are house temporarily for 6 months during which time tenancy support is provided. Has project workers who provide help and support in searching for a new home, applying for benefits etc as well as the tenancy support to tackle problems that may have led to a family becoming homeless or vulnerable. Promotes tenant involvement and runs children's play sessions and an after school club for the children of families involved in the project.
